reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were looking for somewhere to stay in the area, although we weren't visiting Augsberg itself. The hotel is modern and clean, but the location is reflected in the price. It's just off the main road and there isn't anywhere to eat within walking distance. The free wireless was appreciated.
reviews.title: Clean and modern
Surprise where least expected
reviews.text: Rather new, very clean hotel (franchise concept, family run - nice people). Everything is very well organized so the hotel manages to scrap by with minimum staff. The rooms have no keys but a numeric key pad where you input your individual PIN number. the rooms are bright and functional. breakfast was good. ample parking space available. Street Car stop very close by (but no noise)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Good value budget hotel

reviews.text: This hotel is situated about 2 miles from the centre of Augsberg but there is a tram stop just 200 yards away which gets you into town in 10 minutes for 1 euro 20cents.
reviews.title: Basic but OK

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Clean and modern, free internet, good value breakfast at 6 euros 90 cents. Only let down by the dreadful pillows - you only get one tiny one per person and wake up with a painful neck.
reviews.title: Very Clean Hotel....Great for the Price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here one night before traveling to Munich the next day. The price was great, the room was clean and there was free parking. Breakfast was not included and it was okay. The location of the hotel is lame. Not many places to walk to for night life. I thought it was near an old town, but I never saw it.
reviews.title: Great quality for low price!

reviews.text: We spent one night in the hotel on the way to Lake Garda. The room was spotless, appeared fresh and new. We had a family room, one double with bunks facing the double. Our boys were happy with their beds, we thought our matress was on the firm side.
reviews.title: Clean, Functional, everything you expect with B&B
